title: Offering Salted Fish To Master - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural   Xianxia
tags: Amnesia   Antihero Protagonist   Arrogant Characters   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Cruel Characters   Cultivation   Dao Companion   Demon Lord   Demons   Dolls/Puppets   Doting Love Interests   Fast Cultivation   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heavenly Tribulation   Hot-blooded Protagonist   Lazy Protagonist   Male Yandere   Pets   Popular Love Interests   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Schemes And Conspiracies   Shapeshifters   Strong Love Interests   Time Skip   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak Protagonist

description:
Liao Tingyan, a new disciple who had just started and had the lowest rank, got to be near the terrifying great master of Gengchen Xianfu, which caused a lot of discussions.

Shimei Liao, How did you do it?

Liao Tingyan: … By relying on the instinct of salted fish?

(Salted fish: people who have no intention of doing anything.)>
